item.title: Very poor surface. Difficult to traverse using a wheelchair., 7th July
item.description:
The path between Gretton Road and Basset Close is in such poor condition that it is difficult to pass using a wheelchair. I was pushing my friend in his wheelchair and the front wheel entered a hole causing him to be ejected onto the ground.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gretton Road, Winchcombe, Winchcombe, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: Pothole spraying debris onto parked cars, 7th July
item.description:
Pothole in the middle of the road because the road surface is crumbling. The surface crumb is being sprayed by passing vehicles onto the parked cars along with dirty rain water. This road has got a lot busier since they banned parking outside the local school.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4a;4b, Canterbury Walk, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Cycle lane full of debris, 6th July
item.description:
The segregated cycle lane on the Cirencester Road uphill section is littered with a considerable quantity of debris. This problem has quickly reappeared since the last cleaning in March/April time. The cycle lane now contains a dangerous quantity of broken car parts, trade waste and natural debris. For a cyclist, this will greatly increase the chance of a puncture and force users to avoid the cycle lane and move onto the carriageway. Please clean the cycle lane quickly and introduce a regular cleaning regime.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cirencester Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 5 inch pothole outside the entrance to Coffee#1 cafe, 6th July
item.description:
Hello, I’m the store manager at the Coffee#1 cafe in Montpellier gardens. Around 2/3 weeks ago, one of our customers have sprained her ankle on a pothole right outside our main entrance to the cafe which result in her having to take time off and recover. The pothole is around 5inches wide and about 1.5-2inch deep. This continues to be very hazardous as it keeps getting deeper and we wouldn’t want more customers or staff to get hurt. If you need any extra information please call the store phone and ask for Martyna for more details. Thank you in advance.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Montpellier Walk, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
